pilots.name: New Republic Volunteers

shipAbility.name: Resupply Craft
shipAbility.text: After another friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an action, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, it removes 1 orange or red token, or recovers 1 shield.

pilots.text: In use since the Galactic Civil War, groups within the New Republic still utilize the GR-75 medium transport for supply and aid missions.
